## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] Code builds successfully locally

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] API documentation has been updated (if applicable)

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] Integration tests pass locally
- [ ] Code coverage has not decreased

### Database
- [ ] I have created/updated database migrations (if applicable)
- [ ] Migration scripts have been tested
- [ ] Rollback scripts work correctly

### Security
- [ ] I have checked for security vulnerabilities
- [ ] No sensitive data is exposed in logs
- [ ] Authentication/Authorization is properly implemented
- [ ] Input validation is in place

### Performance
- [ ] Changes do not negatively impact performance
- [ ] Database queries are optimized (if applicable)
- [ ] Caching strategy is appropriate
